3: Commandant, the equipment and repair resources are ready.
After countless inspections and investigations, I've made sure what happened last time won't happen again.

4: I knew I could count on you!

3: Commandant, I heard that you've destroyed 500 Corrupted.
The time it took certainly exceeded my expectations, but I'm a man of my word.
I don't know how you came up with something like that.
Do you want me to treat you like Kamui?
I'd be happy to show you the human electrochemical device in my room.
(Sighs) ...I knew you wouldn't be able to guess it.
Here, take it if you want.
Lee reveals an exquisite little robot that would dance when placed on your palm. It also comes with a handy alarm function.
He turns back toward his workbench and continues to tinker with some parts.
Right, one more thing, if you decide to accept it, I won't forgive you if you lose it.
